mapper.insert: insert into data_property_access (app_key,model_id, property_id, grant_target_id, grant_target_type, tenant, access_type, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{appKey},#{modelId}, #{propertyId}, #{grantTargetId}, #{grantTargetType}, #{tenant}, #{accessType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY update status=#{status},access_type=#{accessType},update_time = #{updateTime}
